# Axe: Language (`language`)

`axe/language` contains accessibility rules
from the axe language category.

See the ["Can the hint be configured?"][can configure] section of
`hint-axe` for examples of enabling, disabling, and changing the
severity of individual rules.

## Default rules (WCAG 2.1 Level A and Level AA)

* [\<html> element must have a lang attribute][html-has-lang] (html-has-lang)
* [\<html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute][html-lang-valid] (html-lang-valid)
* [HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language][html-xml-lang-mismatch] (html-xml-lang-mismatch)
* [lang attribute must have a valid value][valid-lang] (valid-lang)
